page.title: 03BODRAVERRAN FARM
page.content: We went to Bodraverran Farm where they have 10 acres of land.It is a small mixed farm.They have two big green- houses in which they grow courgettes, peppers,avocados,cucumbers,grapevines, carrots,lettuce,cabbages,tomatoes, spring-onions and shallots.They take them to a green-grocers shop in Pen- zance. They have lots of chickens and a big American Red Cock,they also have bantams and lacewings.They have many ducks,some of which are Muscovy and others are white ducks with yellow beaks.There are also geese and goslings. They have a sort of hospital for de- formed and injured animals.One of the ducks there is blind,another is lame. Inside the house there is a duckling in an incubator because its mother would not look after it.
